name: Mads Mikkelsen
description:
Mads Dittmann Mikkelsen (22 November 1965) is a Danish actor. Originally a gymnast and dancer, he rose to fame in Denmark as an actor for his roles such as Tonny in the first two films of the Pusher film trilogy (1996, 2004). Mikkelsen achieved worldwide recognition for playing the main antagonist Le Chiffre in the twenty-first James Bond film, Casino Royale (2006).

If you like my work, a review is more than welcome! Also, follow me on Twitter or Instagram!

Looking for something... spicy? Here's my Patreon!

Also, I recently started a blog where I will gather resources and tutorials about my work here!

Hello everyone! Today I present to you my textual inversion of Mads Mikkelsen! I used 40 public images of him with a 9000 steps process. To use it in your works:

  • download the file and place it into stable-diffusion-webui>embeddings folder;

  • add mads65 to your prompt;

  • keep the sampling steps around 20/25, and CFG between 6 and 8 to work well. Great results with DPM++ SDE Karras & Realistic Vision;

meta.prompt: RAW photo, a photo of mads65 wearing a black suit, sunglasses and drinking a coke, (high detailed skin:1.2), 8k UHD, DSLR, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3
